text: William Mathieson (born 1870) was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Glasgow. He played for Clydesdale, Glasgow Thistle, and Manchester United. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1870 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Year of death missing Category:Clydesdale F.C. players Category:Thistle F.C. players Category:Association football forwards Category:Football Alliance players Category:English Football League players
title: William Mathieson
